"The Partner Terminal":
"The Partner Terminal

This is a terminal you can use to call partners who will fight alongside you.
※Partners that first appeared in Episode 5 or whose partner cards came from Omnibus Quests can be called by any character on your account.
※Partner cards acquired from Episodes 1-4 can only be called by the character that acquired them.

You can switch tabs to view Friend Partners, Support Partners and Free Partners, who can also be called to fight alongside you.
